nav.titleAbout: A little bit more about me

goal.title: Software Developer & Project Manager
goal.purposeText: Built software to help companies to automate their processes, do better monitoring and help them to make decisions through their data üìä.
goal.subtitle1Text: It is important for companies to be reactive in this fast modern world üåç. Monitoring processes and indicators with the help of software can assist to catch issues before they happen. While working as a quality manager, I was able to see how motoring can help to save money and time üïñ. That's why as a software developer I am trying to create simple and efficient dashboards for monitoring.
goal.subtitle2Text: It happens frequently that teams are under pressure with an important amount of workload üóÉÔ∏è. Softwares can automate some taks in order to save time, be more efficient and allocate time to more complex tasks. üîé I like to audit processes and search which IT tool I can implement to help teams in their daily tasks.
goal.subtitle3Text: Nowadays, we receive thousands of data in a week üî¢. I like to get revelant information from this data to help teams to take decision with for instance KPI indicators. IA can be from a great tool also to assist to take decision ü§ñ.

about.title1Text:
Throughout my career as a quality manager for food companies, I have often wanted to be able to code tools that would allow me to automate and do better monitoring. Back from my four-year stay in the United States, I decided to take the plunge and obtain a computer science degree.

Today I am happy to be able to make the link between my knowledge in quality management and the one in software development. I am currently creating simple and efficient software to help teams in their daily tasks and to take decisions in the long term.
about.title2: My double experience as a Quality Manager & a Software Developer

dawan.title: Software Developer
dawan.tasks1: Built a planning application, for a training center, to help both the Sales and the HR team to keep track of trainers‚Äô schedules and the list of courses sold (Java / Vue.js)
dawan.tasks2: Created the planning Android application connected to the Rest API with Retrofit for non-admin users
dawan.tasks3: Built a calendar application for the HR team to replace their spreadsheet used as an employee scheduling solution (C# / Vue.js)
dawan.tasks4: Developed a web scraping program with Selenium to help a company to analyze the market (Java / Angular)

cuisine.title: Quality Manager
cuisine.tasks1: Ensured BRC level AA, Organic, ABF, Halal and Gluten-Free certifications, FDA / USDA inspections and customer audits for the plant in Alexandria (Virginia). Traveled also to different factories (the United States and Thailand) to provide technical assistance to help them to prepare their audits
cuisine.tasks2: Managed a quality team with 13 persons (2 managers, 3 supervisors, and 8 technicians)
cuisine.tasks3: Worked with the R&D team to develop new products (from supplier approval to packaging creation)
cuisine.tasks4: Reported the performance of the quality system to senior management during quarterly reviews

florette.title: Quality Assistant Manager
florette.tasks1: Performed internal audits, prepared and participated in external audits (customer audits and IFS/BRC audit)
florette.tasks2: Trained and monitored 11 new quality controllers, managed their schedule, and followed up their projects
florette.tasks3: Collected data, followed and presented KPIs to the Management Team

neuhauser.title: Quality Assistant Manager
neuhauser.tasks1: Managed internal non-conformities and complaints to suppliers
neuhauser.tasks2: Monitored and managed customer satisfaction: customer complaints, specifications, create and update final specifications
neuhauser.tasks3: Helped to create new products (production and quality records to create, final specification and packaging)

quality.title: Project - Quality management system design
quality.subtitle1Text: How to help quality teams with their daily tasks while preparing for audits during the year ?
quality.subtitle2Monitoring: Monitoring : Dashboard, alert NC not claused or when recurrence of a NC
quality.subtitle2Automate: Automate : send email, organize documents received from suppliers, use API from suppliers like laboratory.
quality.subtitle2Decision: Decision helper : Quarterly review, KPI indicators, follow up on audit preparation, IA to follow some sensitive processes
quality.subtitle3Monitoring: Monitoring : Dashboard for QA team, notify managers immediately when there is a quality issue, different pages : suppliers, food fraud, trainings, etc.
quality.subtitle3Automate: Automate : send email, organize documents received from suppliers, use API from suppliers like laboratory.
quality.supplierFile: Save files from suppliers in their folders
quality.notification: Notify QA team to review new documents
quality.subtitle3Decision: Decision helper : Quarterly review, KPI indicators, follow up on audit preparation, IA to follow some sensitive processes.
